Miles Sound System SDK 6.6h

DDK Digital Function: DMAC_enable

Discussion

Input:

DMA_channel

Output:

Nothing
All registers changed

Purpose:

Unmasks DMA channel, enabling DMA transfers


Group: DDK Support Routines for Digital Sound Drivers
